channel.title: Help!
channel.description: i need the ::starter commands from someons server please cause i dont have 1 thanks!

item.title: Help!
item.dc:creator: @amy_webb1 amy_webb
item.description:
@amy_webb1 wrote:

    }
    if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("starter")) {	
        if (starter == 0) {
            addItem(995, 5000);
            addItem(392, 50);
            addItem(554, 100);
            addItem(555, 100);
            addItem(556, 100);
            addItem(557, 100);
            addItem(558, 100);
            addItem(559, 100);
            addItem(563, 100);
            addItem(1265, 1);
            addItem(1351, 1);
            addItem(2347, 1);
            addItem(590, 1);
            sendMessage("You have been given money, food and runes use them wisely.");
            sendMessage("Also you have been given tools to start basic skills.");
            sendMessage("Don't try to use ::starter agian it won't work!");
            sendMessage("to start type ::commands.");
            starter = 1;
            savemoreinfo();
        } else if (starter == 1) {
            sendMessage("Already typed that!");
            PlayerHandler.messageToAll = (playerName
                    + " smells funny!!");

        }

is mine from a PI server
